archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.1.2b: b) takes into account an information classification scheme (i.e. the method of classifying information according to its assigned level of confidentiality, such as confidential, internal and public)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
